title: WHO被中共蓝金黄石锤了吧
contents:
So far, WHO is aware of one case of human-to-human transmission of #coronavirus outside China, in Vietnam. 
[url=https://mobile.twitter.com/WHO][/url]

That’s still one case too many. But we’re encouraged that so far we have not seen more human-to-human transmission outside China. We’re monitoring the outbreak constantly.

https://mobile.twitter.com/WHO/status/1221929483885797382

之前不发PHEIC借口是没有境外人传人案例，现在有了又马上就改口表示只有一例不用慌。这简直是强国外交部派人来接管了吧？我看日本德国这两例人传人爆出来了还接着耍什么花样装死狗。这个破组织存在的意义不就是防患于未然吗？真全球大流行都爆发了你再来发警告有屁用。
